document.full_text: the european union could temporarily reintroduce visas for some travelers from outside the bloc in case of a sudden influx of migrants from a specific country, under plans presented by the eu executive on tuesday.
document.title: eu prepares for emergency restoration of visa rules
lines_and_colors: the european union could temporarily reintroduce visas for some travelers from outside the bloc in case of a sudden influx of migrants from a specific country, under plans presented by the eu executive on tuesday.
